dict.acceptation: 生长；增长；一茬植株；肿块，肿瘤；

sent.orig: FP-Growth algorithm adopts pattern fragment growth method and only scans database twice.
sent.trans: FP-Growth算法是一种基于模式增长的频繁模式挖掘算法，避免了大量候选项集的产生，只需要两次扫描数据库。

sent.orig: It has been proven that FP-growth algorithm is better than Apriori algorithm.
sent.trans: 实验和研究证明FP-growth算法优于Apriori算法。

sent.orig: The famous algorithms to find the frequent itemsets include Apriori and FP-growth.
sent.trans: 经典的生成频繁项目集集合的算法包括Apriori算法和FP-growth算法。

sent.orig: The mechanism of crystal growth has been revealed that is a typical multi-two-dimensional nucleation-layer growth-quasi-normal growth.
sent.trans: 揭示了该晶体是一种典型的多二维成核-层生长-准法向生长机制。

sent.orig: The growth period, nitrogen fixation, growth condition and other growth characteristics of Nostoc. sp were studied.
sent.trans: 摘要研究了念珠藻的生长周期、固氮特性、生长条件等生长特性。
